Corporate Illustrations

I crafted a collection of corporate illustrations tailored for an IT department's learning materials, infusing them with professionalism and cohesion. These illustrations not only enhance the visual appeal of the materials but also establish a distinct identity for the department, fostering a cohesive and unified brand presence. By seamlessly integrating these visuals, I've helped elevate the department's learning materials, reinforcing their expertise and authority within the corporate environment.
